![](data:image/x-emf;base64...)

High Risk The area/ equipment is open for direct handling by employees and in direct contact with packaging

Medium Risk The area /equipment is close but there is no direct handling by employees

Low Risk Personnel Facilities/Remote area from manufacturing sites
